#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Tadlo
#Text=Tadlo ( ຕາດເລາະ ) is a village in Laos .
#Text=Get in
#Text=From Pakse , get a bus to Salavan and asked to be dropped off at the road for Tadlo ( 30,000 kip ) .
#Text=From the drop-off point after the bridge , it 's about 2km down a road on the right hand side .
#Text=There may be a tuk-tuk waiting to take you and the going rate is 5,000 kip/person .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Tadlo is easily navigated on foot .
#Text=See
#Text=Tadlo waterfalls .
#Text=There are 3 waterfalls within 10km of Tadlo .
#Text=The first is right next to the village , the second is about a 1km walk upstream and the third is about 8km upstream .
#Text=The second waterfall can be easily found by following the jungle path on the left hand side of the river ( facing upstream ) .
#Text=You will hear it before you see it , and there is a home-made set of steps to take you down to the bottom of the waterfall where you can swim .
#Text=You can also hop around the large stones at the top of the waterfall , and even jump off if you are brave enough , although check the area you 're jumping into first .
#Text=Do
#Text=Trekking .
#Text=Treks with guides can be arrange at the Tourist Info .
#Text=Sites include the surrounding forest and Katu and Alak tribes people , as well as waterfalls .
#Text=Elephant Rides .
#Text=Tadlo Lodge offers elephant treks for 100,000 kip/person .
#Text=The trek takes around 1 1/2 hours and the elephants are very friendly and timid .
#Text=Buy
#Text=There are a couple of small shops selling the necessities .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=The cheapest river views in simple huts .
#Text=30,000 kip .
#Text=Sephaseuth Guest House & Restaurant , ☏ +85620214185 .
#Text=Next to the river , an alternative place to stay .
#Text=Tim 's Guest House & Restaurant .
#Text=Run by a local Lao couple , this guest house is definitely the pick of the bunch .
#Text=The owners are very friendly ( even voted Lao citizen of the year ) and help support the local community with some of the money they make .
#Text=Rooms are simple but nice , and the atmosphere and staff are great .
#Text=Connect
#Text=Tim 's Guest House operates a local computer school and they have good internet access via 3G at 200 kip/minute .
#Text=If you have your own device it is 10,000 kip for unlimited wifi access .
#Text=Go next
#Text=Walk back to the main street in Salavan ( or catch a ride from one of the guesthouses ) .
#Text=Buses back to Pakse operate a few times a day - ask a guesthouse for times - and cost 25,000 kip .
#Text=just wait by the side of the road .
